org.sindice.siren.index

Class SirenDocsEnum

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.lucene.search.DocIdSetIterator
      • org.apache.lucene.index.DocsEnum
        • org.apache.lucene.index.DocsAndPositionsEnum
          • org.sindice.siren.index.SirenDocsEnum

  • public abstract class SirenDocsEnum
extends org.apache.lucene.index.DocsAndPositionsEnum
    This DocsAndPositionsEnum extension acts as a decorator over a DocsNodesAndPositionsEnum.

    It enables to provide a DocsNodesAndPositionsEnum instance to a NodeQuery.

    Subclasses must wrap a DocsNodesAndPositionsEnum instance and implements the method getDocsNodesAndPositionsEnum() to return the wrapped instance.
